data.name: Fantasy Grounds - H2-The Maze Under Stormpeak 4E Fantasy (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
H2-The Maze Under Stormpeak

4E Fantasy Token Pack

Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your needs.

This pack contains tokens for the following characters:

  • angel valor (medium)
  • arbalester (medium)
  • bat fire (medium)
  • boar dire (large)
  • bronze warder (large)
  • brug (large)
  • choker cavern (small)
  • demon barlgura (large)
  • demon evistro (medium)
  • devil imp (tiny)
  • devil spined (medium)
  • doomsphere (large)
  • dragon green young (large)
  • drake rage (large)
  • dreaded sorceror 01
  • duergar guard (medium)
  • duergar master smith (medium)
  • duergar miner (medium)
  • duergar murkelmor (medium)
  • duergar scout (medium)
  • duergar shock trooper (large)
  • duergar shock trooper (medium)
  • duergar theurge (medium)
  • dwarf bolter (medium)
  • elemental vortex (medium)
  • enigma of vecna bloodied (medium)
  • enigma of vecna (medium)
  • ettercap webspinner (medium)
  • ghoul (medium)
  • gnoll demonic scourge (medium)
  • gnoll huntmaster (medium)
  • gnoll marauder (medium)
  • goblin blackblade (small)
  • goblin bugbear warrior (medium)
  • goblin hobgoblin archer (medium)
  • goblin hobgoblin commander (medium)
  • goblin hobgoblin soldier (medium)
  • goblin hobgoblin warcaster (medium)
  • goblin sharpshooter (small)
  • goblin skullcleaver (small)
  • human bandit (medium)
  • human berserker (medium)
  • hyena (medium)
  • kruthik adult (medium)
  • kruthik hive lord (large)
  • lycanthrope werewolf (medium)
  • maldric scarmaker (medium)
  • mirrors (medium)
  • norker berserker (small)
  • norker grunt (small)
  • norker shadowblade (small)
  • norker slinger (small)
  • norker (small)
  • ogre savage (large)
  • ooze gelatinous cube (large)
  • orc berserker (medium)
  • orc raider (medium)
  • ordinator arcanis (medium)
  • phalagar (large)
  • skeleton bonecrusher (huge)
  • skeleton boneshard (medium)
  • skeleton warrior (medium)
  • statue baphomet (medium)
  • statue minotaur bloodtaker (gargantuan)
  • stormpeak symbol
  • surina (medium)
  • terrlen darkseeker (medium)
  • tiefling darkblade (medium)
  • tiefling heretic (medium)
  • troglodyte curse chanter (medium)
  • troglodyte impaler (medium)
  • troglodyte mauler (medium)
  • vadriar sage (medium)
  • wight deathlock (medium)
  • wight (medium)
  • wolf dire (large)
  • wraith (medium)
  • zombie rotwing (medium)

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on January 16, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: H2-The Maze Under Stormpeak4E Fantasy Token PackTokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your needs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
